messages.zh: 第一关（后）
成功撤出核心区！！
messages.tl: Successfully withdraw from the core area! !

messages.zh: 优先确认敌情！
我已经清理干净了。
杜宾！
你平安无事就好......
损伤状况清点完毕，两名干员轻伤，但还都能行动！
messages.tl: The damage was counted and the two cadres were slightly injured, but they were all able to act!

messages.zh: 抱歉，是我的失责，没能完整了解整合运动的战术。
messages.tl: Sorry, it’s my fault, I didn’t fully understand the tactics of the Reunion Movement.

messages.zh: 最开始我以为他们混在普通居民中。
messages.tl: At first I thought they were mixed among ordinary residents.

messages.zh: 但当他们发动进攻时——
我才意识到整个人群中连一个普通居民也没有。
messages.tl: I realized that there wasn't even an ordinary resident in the entire population.

messages.zh: 他们已经......谋划的这么周全了吗？怎么可能......
messages.tl: Have they been so planned? How can it be......

messages.zh: 短程通讯设备也彻底失灵了。
messages.tl: Short-range communication equipment has also completely failed.

messages.zh: 整合运动，究竟策划了什么？
我，我的天......我们是不是真的要完蛋了......
messages.tl: Me, my God... are we really going to die...

messages.zh: 罗德岛真值得他们如此大动干戈吗.......
messages.tl: Rhodes Island really deserves such a big move....

messages.zh: 闹出这么大动静，切尔诺伯格当局可不会坐视不管啊！
messages.tl: With such a big noise, the Chernobyl authorities will not sit idly by!

messages.zh: 冷静下来。
已经没有什么切尔诺伯格当局了。
